parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The provided post does not contain a CMF number.  While the absence of a CMF number doesn't automatically exclude it from being considered electoral propaganda, it suggests it might not be directly linked to an officially registered campaign.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "PNL" (Partidul Național Liberal) and "Ilie Bolojan".  Ilie Bolojan is a prominent member of the PNL and likely a candidate in the parliamentary elections. This directly refers to a political party and a person associated with it, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The targeting parameters (age, location) further confirm its intention to address a broad segment of the population, satisfying Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The message "PNL și Ilie Bolojan – Alegerea pentru un Parlament al faptelor!" ("PNL and Ilie Bolojan – The choice for a Parliament of deeds!") clearly aims to promote the PNL and Ilie Bolojan, encouraging voters to support them. This directly serves an electoral objective, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - c. The phrasing suggests a positive endorsement and aims to influence voting behavior.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post lacks the characteristics of journalistic reporting. It's not presenting objective facts or diverse perspectives. Instead, it's a concise, promotional statement designed to sway public opinion in favor of the PNL and Ilie Bolojan.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The statement is not a personal opinion; it's a clear political endorsement presented as a paid advertisement.  It lacks the nuance and complexity expected of a personal opinion piece.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1267675860939708</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific candidate (implicitly through party affiliation), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has a clear electoral objective: to promote the PNL and Ilie Bolojan.  The absence of a CMF number is not sufficient to negate these factors.  The post's concise and promotional nature further distinguishes it from journalistic reporting or personal opinion.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Ilie Bolojan</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>PNL</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PNL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Mihaiță Negură, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări plătite pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu ID-ul 1267675860939708, care promovează PNL și Ilie Bolojan cu mesajul "PNL și Ilie Bolojan – Alegerea pentru un Parlament al faptelor!", având un efect electoral clar de a influența votul în favoarea acestora. Postarea, deși nu conține un număr CMF, îndeplinește toate criteriile propagandei electorale conform articolului 36 (7) din LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, adresându-se unui public larg prin intermediul unei reclame plătite pe Facebook, cu o cheltuială de sub 100 RON, ajungând la 10.000-15.000 de impresii și o estimare a acoperirii de 100.000-500.000 de persoane.  Informațiile de contact ale advertiserului sunt mihaitanegura@yahoo.com și +40723177715.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
